Interface MainController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainControllerImpl

    public interface MainController
    Business logic of System actor.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    alex323glo

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        boolean addUser(User user)
         throws ArgumentValidationException,
                DaoRecordOverrideException
        Writes user data to system's DB.
        Parameters:
        user - user's data which will be written to system's DB.
        Returns:
        true if operation was successful and false - if it wasn't.
        Throws:
        ArgumentValidationException - when argument doesn't pass validation.
        DaoRecordOverrideException - when argument's id is already in use in DB.
        See Also:
        User, ArgumentValidationException, DaoRecordOverrideException

      • verifyUserAccess

        java.lang.String verifyUserAccess(User user)
                           throws ArgumentValidationException,
                                  DaoRecordNotFoundException
        Generates access token by entered user's data.
        Parameters:
        user - user's data, which will be used to generate accessToken.
        Returns:
        new accessToken String.
        Throws:
        ArgumentValidationException - when argument doesn't pass validation.
        DaoRecordNotFoundException - when DB doesn't contain such user.
        See Also:
        User, ArgumentValidationException, DaoRecordNotFoundException

      • getAccessTokenTarget

        java.lang.String getAccessTokenTarget(java.lang.String accessToken)
                               throws ArgumentValidationException,
                                      DaoRecordNotFoundException
        Finds target identifier (User email) of Access Token.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Access Token String which we are searching for in DB.
        Returns:
        target identifier (user email) of Access Token.
        Throws:
        ArgumentValidationException - when argument doesn't pass validation.
        DaoRecordNotFoundException - when DB doesn't contain such Access Token.
        See Also:
        ArgumentValidationException, DaoRecordNotFoundException

      • restrictUserAccess

        void restrictUserAccess(java.lang.String accessToken)
                 throws ArgumentValidationException,
                        DaoRecordNotFoundException
        Destroys entered access token in DB.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - access token String, which will be removed from DB.
        Throws:
        ArgumentValidationException - when argument doesn't pass validation.
        DaoRecordNotFoundException - when DB doesn't contain such accessToken record.
        See Also:
        ArgumentValidationException, DaoRecordNotFoundException

      • loadPublicFile

        byte[] loadPublicFile(java.lang.String fileName)
               throws ArgumentValidationException,
                      LoadFileException
        Creates a byte array of needed public file from system's resources.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of searched public file in system's resources.
        Returns:
        needed public file converted to byte array.
        Throws:
        ArgumentValidationException - when argument doesn't pass validation.
        LoadFileException - when system has some problems with loading of needed file from system's resources.
        See Also:
        ArgumentValidationException, LoadFileException

      • loadPrivateFile

        byte[] loadPrivateFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                       java.lang.String accessToken)
                throws ArgumentValidationException,
                       TokenNotExistsException,
                       LoadFileException
        Creates a byte array of needed private file from system's resources.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of searched private file in system's resources.
        accessToken - token, which verifies access to needed private file from system's resources.
        Returns:
        needed private file converted to byte array.
        Throws:
        ArgumentValidationException - when argument doesn't pass validation.
        TokenNotExistsException - when system's DB doesn't contain such accessToken.
        LoadFileException - when system has some problems with loading of needed file from system's resources.
        See Also:
        ArgumentValidationException, LoadFileException
